title: Promotional trolls
body:
So today ive gone for promos a few times (a good 5-6 times in the last week)

Each and EVERY time, its been people throwing all trolling. I like how Rito will go "hurr durrrrrrr matched with equal skill huuurrrrr *drool comes from mouth*". If that was true, i'd be given people interested in winning, not people going "OMG ENEMY TURRET" *dry humps enemy turret and gives enemy team (usually adc or mid) a free kill*

I also like how the green named people ive seen will sit on ritos overly happy lap and go "they arent in the wrong huuuuuuuurrrrrrrrrrrr" *drool flows like a water fall from the mouth* like they actually play. 

Sure you'll play 1 maybe 2 games a week but have they actually seen the community and how it behaves? (100% chance on no). 

Whats worse is the reporting system does jack all. Report trolls after game (feeding, afking) and nothing happens. Community goes "HUUUUURRRRRRRRRR TOXIK REPERTER" *insert more drool here* because i get sick of that crap fast.

Wouldn't report people if they werent feeding or trolling and crap. How is this acceptable, but not calling people out?

I wanna know/see whats being done about it. Waiting to see thin air.

replies.body:
Sadly since the change of the dynamic queue, all you can now do is get REALLY good, pray that you get a competent team, or join a team.

Riot done goofed this game up since it's introduction and threw this game off a cliff.

Bout time someone else picked up on it. I like you.

But the problem is, the level of downs is full blown impossible to carry when all you seem to get is the support role.

> [{quoted}](name=Blaster Joker,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=dIzAPbIf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-04T11:28:09.305+0000)
>
> Bout time someone else picked up on it. I like you.
> 
> But the problem is, the level of downs is full blown impossible to carry when all you seem to get is the support role.

You just have to hope to get a competent team. I'll usually give my adc time to prove if they are reasonable or a muppet and then adjust my strategy accordingly, e.g. roam if they are a muppet. As support usually I'll have a day with 8 losses in a row, and then a day with 8 wins in a  row. Luck of the draw in low elo.

I picked up on it about 15 games into this season, some 2 weeks after the start of S6, too bad no one listens.

~150 games in S6 and ~20 in S5, same rank. Thanks for the queue changes Riot, it really made your game better.

In the past I have gone past gold with less games than I have now.

Hey man,

We have [promo-helper](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/na/site/2016-season-update/ranked-improvements.html) right now to help players who get unlucky/tilted in promos. Next time you qualify for promos again you'll have a free win lined up, which means you'll only need to** win one game to advance.** That should make your climb to the next rank a lot easier.

> _**That said, ranked is supposed to be hard. **_
> 
> + That's why it's rewarding to get to the next rank. The journey will be tough as well. You're not entitled to **free wins**, **good teams** or **easy carrying**. You have to earn all of that yourself. You need to put in the work.
> 
> + It normal to struggle to climb after a while. It's an indicator that you're at the limit to your current skill. When you're at that point, you need to shift your focus to improving so you can climb further. We have instructors who are happy to help, there's also [YouTube videos](https://www.youtube.com/user/ScrapComputer) and even [online coaches](https://www.lol-coaching.com/) to help you a long. You still have to make the effort though.
> 
> Attitude plays a bigger role in climbing ranked than people think. I think if you focused on self-improvement you could be far higher than you are now.

I hope that helped a bit :D

I am worried about you. You seemed to miss "IM GETTING TROLLS EVERY PROMOS" (caps for you to actually see it this time)

Promo helper does shit all when you have so many intentional feeders in a row. 
If it REALLY wanted to help, after so many times, it would skip the promo games. 
I can't carry trash EVERY game. And that's something being completely ignored.

Rest assured, I did read that part ;) But I dismissed it as a crazy exaggeration.
> _Here's why:_
> 
> If there really is a troll in every promo series, like you claim. It should be extremely easy to climb out over 5-6 attempts. 
> 
> + Assuming you're not a troll yourself, there's a **44%** chance you get a troll on your team, and a **56%** chance the enemy gets a troll. That's a 56% winrate, which is very decent.
> 
> The odds are really in your favour, especially once we take into consideration the free wins from promo-helper.

__*

In reality, you probably just got unlucky in a few promos and landed with some trolls. That sucks :( 

 But please, don't use trolls as the reason you can't climb. As I mentioned above, the trolls will cancel themselves out. _**You're the only common factor in all your games. Focus on improving, and the wins will come naturally.**_

__*

> If it REALLY wanted to help, after so many times, it would skip the promo games.

 + Personally I think even promo-helper went too far. Giving people free wins makes climbing a little bit trivial. This would definitely be a solution though. **Riot**'s probably a little careful with it, because it's not the healthiest of designs.

+ I'm sure **Riot** would like to see trolls and feeders entirely removed from the game as well, but sadly that's probably not going to be achievable ever. 

 **That doesn't mean Riot is doing nothing.** We recently had improvements for AFKs with /remake, and **Riot** is still hard at work on the tribunal which will help crackdown on trolling and intentional feeding. Trolling is a big long-term issue, that's going to require a lot of work.

I hope you can get back to climbing soon man!

Yet they seem to NEVER get a troll while I get 4. So that seems flawed. 
The "Improvements" to the /remake system that was introduced has already been abused. 
We have someone play for 5 minutes. AFK for roughly 15 and come back for the end. You know what happened?
I'd say you guessed it but I express extreme doubt. Nothing happened to them, and they continue to play UNPUNISHED.

So all I can conclude is that you (as well as RITO) condone trolling and it should be enforced if you intend to climb. 
Which makes no sense. The "mods" (I say it like that since it seems none really know the community OR play the game) and company seem to be "against" it.

 I fail to see how rewarding this behaviour or turning a blind eye to it is "improving the community".

If you don't want to change your opinion despite any facts or evidence, then there is nothing I can do to help you. I'll say this though; ranked is far more enjoyable when you're able to focus on self improvement rather than shifting blame ;)

__*

> Yet they seem to NEVER get a troll while I get 4. So that seems flawed.

You've played 906 games this season in ranked. Please don't try and tell me you got a troll every time, and the enemy team never got a troll even once.

The odds of that happening is **0.44^906**. Which is insanely small. You're literally more likely to be struck by lighting tomorrow. Even if we just counted promo games, it's still around 0.00027% chance.

**So either:**

1. **Riot** is purposefully putting trolls only in your game.
2. This is a crazy coincidence with a 1e-323 chance of happening.
3. _**You're actually not always getting trolls.**_

I'll be blunt. Trolls are not the reason why you aren't climbing. It is your own skill that's holding you back.

Trolls are a huge negative experience and I hate them as well. However, they are not the only reason (or even a large reason) as to why you're finding it hard to climb.

__*

> So all I can conclude is that you (as well as RITO) condone trolling and it should be enforced if you intend to climb.

Not at all. Sorry you misinterpreted it this way.

As you rightly pointed out a few of the systems do have flaws. They are not perfect. If you have ideas on how to improve them without side effects, I'm sure they'd be happy to hear it. 

Just because trolls still exist, doesn't mean Riot condones trolling though. I mean, criminals still exist, does that mean the police condone illegal activity?
DO something Riot your Qs are getting longer for a reason people are tired of the trolls, people are moving on to other games.

Dude ima hit u with a little insight if u struggle climbing and solo yolo is giving u trash post lfg get a 4man/5man play dynamic with them only u will win the game with no skill dynamic que doesnt require u to be good at the game to win u just need to have numbers and hope the enemy either have less premade or even but bad premade 

And tbh doing promos by yourself is just asking to lose due to the fact promos are made to challenge u but lessing your chances of getting decent players and putting u against decent players of the next tier up so play the numbers game i hope this helps u and anyone that reads this because thats how most boosted players get to plat and diamomd these days no skill required

Problem is while be forcfully stuck in a low tier elo, you don't really get the option to duo because the community is busy going "HURRHURR YOUR LO ELO, UR BAAAAAAD KID HUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR" *drool foams from mouth*
